CONTROLS.TerrainHeightToolsLineOfSightRuler: Terrain Height Tools Line of Sight Ruler
CONTROLS.TerrainHeightToolsTokenLineOfSight: Terrain Height Tools Token Line of Sight

KEYBINDINGS.DecreaseLosRulerHeight: Decrease Line of Sight Ruler Height
KEYBINDINGS.IncreaseLosRulerHeight: Increase Line of Sight Ruler Height
KEYBINDINGS.ToggleTerrainHeightMapOnTokenLayer: Toggle Terrain Height Map on Token Layer

SETTINGS.DefaultTokenLosHeight.Name: Default Token LoS Height
SETTINGS.DefaultTokenLosHeight.Hint: The default value for the Token Line of Sight tool's token height setting. This determines what height the LoS is drawn from relative to the token. Note that this won't take effect until the next time the players refresh.
SETTINGS.DisplayLosMeasurementGm.Name: Display Line of Sight Ruler (GM)
SETTINGS.DisplayLosMeasurementGm.Hint: Whether to display the GM's line of sight measurement ruler to other connected players or not.
SETTINGS.DisplayLosMeasurementPlayer.Name: Display Line of Sight Ruler (Player)
SETTINGS.DisplayLosMeasurementPlayer.Hint: Whether to display the players' line of sight measurement rulers to other connected players or not.
SETTINGS.OtherUserLineOfSightRulerOpacity.Name: Other Users' LoS Ruler Opacity
SETTINGS.OtherUserLineOfSightRulerOpacity.Hint: How transparent other user's line of sight rulers appear to you.
SETTINGS.ShowTerrainHeightOnTokenLayer: Show Terrain Height Map on Token Layer
SETTINGS.TerrainHeightLayerRenderAboveTiles.Name: Terrain Height Map Above Tiles
SETTINGS.TerrainHeightLayerRenderAboveTiles.Hint: Whether or not the terrain height map will be drawn above non-overhead tiles on the scene. This can be also be set per-scene.
SETTINGS.TerrainHeightLayerVisibilityRadius.Name: Terrain Height Map Visibility Radius
SETTINGS.TerrainHeightLayerVisibilityRadius.Hint: How far around the mouse cursor the terrain height map is visible. Use 0 to show the entire map.
SETTINGS.TerrainTypes.Name: Terrain Types
SETTINGS.TerrainTypes.Hint: Configure what kind of terrain types are available to be drawn to a scene.
SETTINGS.TerrainHeightLayerSmartLabelPlacement.Hi: If enabled, will attempt to be smarter about where labels are placed on complex shapes. If disabled, labels will simply appear at the center of the shape, though for concave shapes or shapes with holes this may fall outside the painted area.
SETTINGS.TokenLosToolPreselectToken1.Name: Token LoS: Auto-populate Primary Token
SETTINGS.TokenLosToolPreselectToken1.Hint: If enabled, when selecting the Token Line of Sight tool, will automatically populate the primary token with your owned token (or selected token if you do not own one).
SETTINGS.TokenLosToolPreselectToken2.Name: Token LoS: Auto-populate Secondary Token
SETTINGS.TokenLosToolPreselectToken2.Hint: If enabled, when selecting the Token Line of Sight tool, will automatically populate the secondary token with your first targeted token.
SETTINGS.UseFractionsForLabels.Name: Use Fractions in Labels
SETTINGS.UseFractionsForLabels.Hint: If turned on, values such as 0.5 will be replaced with Â½ when used for terrain labels or ruler heights.

TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.ClearConfirmContent: Permanently delete all terrain data from this scene?
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.DeleteTerrainTypeHint:
Edit the types of terrain that can be painted onto the scene.

Note: Removing a terrain type will clear cells that are using it from the scene on next save.
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.Elevation.Name: Elevation
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.Elevation.Hint: How far the bottom of the terrain is above the ground
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.EndHeight.Name: End Height
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.EndHeight.Hint: This is the height of the last point of the ruler. You can also adjust this using +/- on the keyboard while dragging the ruler. If not set to anything, uses the same height as the start point.
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.Height.Name: Height
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.ImportTerrainTypesPresetHint: Here are some terrain presets that you can quickly import, which have been kindly submitted by the community.
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.ImportTextPlaceholder: Paste your terrain type export here...
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.LabelFormatHint: Use <u>%h%</u> for the numeric height of the terrain, and <u>%e%</u> for the elevation
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.NoTerrainTypesWarn: No terrain types configured. Click to configure.
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.SameTokenSelected: You have already selected this token for line of sight, please select a different one
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.MissingLibWrapperWarning: Terrain Height Tools now requires the libWrapper module to work. Please ensure it is installed and enabled or you may encounter issues.
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.StartHeight.Name: Start Height
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.StartHeight.Hint: This is the height of the first point of the ruler. You can also adjust this using +/- on the keyboard before starting to drag the ruler.
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.TokenLineOfSightConfigHint: Select two tokens to measure line of sight between them.
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.TokenLineOfSightRelativeRayPosition: Position of ray relative to the token. Currently: {current}
TERRAINHEIGHTTOOLS.TokenLineOfSightSelectTokenHint: Click on a token to select it, or click on the 'Select token' button again to cancel
